Question: Anne Sullivan died in 1936 after a coma, with this person holding her hand.
Hints: In 1999, this person was listed in Gallup's Most Widely Admired People of the 20th century.
A prolific author, this person was well-travelled and outspoken in her convictions.
In 1984, this person's life story was made into a TV movie called The Miracle Continues.
